Articles.Content: heeeyyyy so how do i update ksp???? i'm confused.

@Jude_in_space I've split your question off into it's own thread, you'll get better answers that way.

If you got the game through Steam it should update itself automatically.  If you got the game through another service like GoG, I would assume it would do the same.   The KSP store requires you to actively download the full game or the updater.
